meet our teams

OUR LEADERSHIP TEAM

At Catalyx, we are fortunate that our leadership team defines and amplifies the culture of our organization. They direct and inspire their teams through motivation and empowerment to deliver the company’s vision of social transformation.

meet our teams

SHARED SERVICES

The Shared Services Department (Admin, HR, Finance, I.T. & Analytics Division, and Catalyx Training) acts as a support structure for the organization, project teams and clients. The department is a fundamental need for the operational requirements of the organization and has the extended arm for support and adherence to legal compliance.

OUR REGIONAL TEAMS
The Catalyx Regional Teams are passionate about community development and people development. The understanding of the different demographics, diversity and dynamics of the different provinces and regions within the provinces make it easy for them to align candidates being trained to potential opportunities for employment. The projects are fast paced and requires resilience and agility, and this group of individuals are remarkable when it comes to adapting to change.
